description: Speaking of slow lorises, here’s the video Rico thought was of one opening its gigantic freaking eyes. Turns out this is not in fact a loris, but a Tarsier: Here, on the other hand, is an actual slow loris, eating a rice ball and probably making you squeal ’til you weep at its unstoppable cuteness:

contentencoded:
Speaking of slow lorises, here’s the video Rico thought was of one opening its gigantic freaking eyes. Turns out this is not in fact a loris, but a Tarsier:



Here, on the other hand, is an actual slow loris, eating a rice ball and probably making you squeal ’til you weep at its unstoppable cuteness:
teaser: Speaking of slow lorises, here’s the video Rico thought was of one opening its gigantic freaking eyes. title: Rihanna, Crime Solver
